name: 楊元森
objective: 這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎的計算機概論。 本課程將以C/C++教授物件、類別、控制敘述、函數、陣列、向量、指標、字串、資料抽象化、控制元超載、繼承、及變形等課題。（學校規定之專業必修課程）
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Programming Design  
Week 2:Introduction to C++
Week 3: Control Statements: if … else
Week 4: Control Statements: for repetition I 
Week 5: Control Statements: for repetition II
Week 6: Control Statements: do…while repetition I
Week 7: Control Statements: do…while repetition II
Week 8: Control Statements: break and continue 
Week 9: Midterm Simulation
Week 10: Midterm
Week 11: Functions
Week 12: Arrays
Week 13: Multidimensional Arrays
Week 14: Pointers
Week 15: Sequential-Access Files
Week 16: Classes
Week 17: Final Simulation
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Class performance (quiz, activities, discussions): 30% (+/- 10%)
Midterm: 20% (+/- 5%)
Final: 50% (+/- 10%)
materials:
Textbook: Prata, S. (2011). C++ Primer Plus 6th ed., Addison-Wesley Professional, USA. 

Official web page:
http://elearning.ntut.edu.tw/ (through your account and password)
